title: The Fishing Derby
description: It's time for the annual Deer Lake Fishing Derby. Last year, all the kids except for Luis caught fish and won prizes. This year Luis is determined to win, and using his secret plan, he is sure not to fail.
highFrequencyWords: bullhorn, Derby, determined, enormous, fishing, patiently, perched, prize, secret
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Quotation Marks                : Identify and understand the use of quotation marks
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
